vscodeUsage-------------------------------------------------``cqh_file_watcher -c ***.conf``conf example>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>use pattern::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::.. code-block:: {"command_list":[ { "pattern": "*.py", "command": "sudo supervisorctl restart redis" } ], "directory": "/home/vagrant/code/code1" }no pattern:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::.. code-block:: {"command_list":[ { "command": "echo things changed" } ], "directory":
